Detailed Description

Distributed collection of counters to collect in order to produce statistics

Server part.

Each process generates an EventStat data that correspond to a set of values. These EventStat are cumulated in order to produce global statistics about the execution. This operation involves an field by field accumulation with various cumulative operators (+, max, min ). A set of userdefined field exist. That could be re-used in order to cumulate order counter.

The SetStatisticsService service reify the CounterManager::notify method with SendStatistics callback
